UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Peptidomimetic antibiotics disrupt the lipopolysaccharide transport bridge of drug-resistant Enterobacteriaceae.
Literature.Author: Schuster M, Brabet E, Oi KK, Desjonquères N, Moehle K, Le Poupon K, Hell S, Gable S, Rithié V, Dillinger S, Zbinden P, Luther A, Li C, Stiegeler S, D'Arco C, Locher HH, Remus T, DiMaio S, Motta P, Wach A, Jung F, Upert G, Obrecht D, Benghezal M, Zerbe O

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.063µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 LtpA(Q62L)(MIC=1µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=41µM)
